meanings.definition: The act of transmitting something again.
meanings.sent1: The retransmission of the radio broadcast ensured everyone could hear it clearly.
meanings.sent2: The retransmission of the email was necessary due to a technical glitch.
meanings.sent3: The retransmission of the joke made everyone laugh even harder the second time.
meanings.sent4: The retransmission of the news spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The retransmission of the song made it even more popular than before.

meanings.definition: The process of sending a message or signal again.
meanings.sent1: The retransmission of the distress signal saved the stranded hikers.
meanings.sent2: The retransmission of the data packet was crucial for completing the transfer.
meanings.sent3: The retransmission of the text message made sure it was received by the recipient.
meanings.sent4: The retransmission of the signal boosted the communication range significantly.
meanings.sent5: The retransmission of the alert reached all the emergency responders in time.
